name: Robo-Jump (Enopa)
description:
Robo-Jump

A small 2D platforming game where you must move vertically to escape the rising danger zone (lava???)

AD to move left and right, Space to jump
Left click to dash, right click to sprint

Wall-jumping is also possible, let go of AD and instantly press jump to gain a small boost. 

Source Files:
https://github.com/Enopa/Robo-Jump
